mapper.select: SELECT emp_dept_name from department where emp_dept_idx = #{param1}

SELECT cr.chat_room_idx, cr.chat_room_name, cr.chat_room_date, cp.emp_id from chat_room cr join chat_pp cp on cr.chat_room_idx = cp.chat_room_idx where cp.emp_id = #{param1} ORDER BY cr.chat_room_date DESC;

SELECT cr.chat_room_idx, cr.chat_room_name, cm.emp_id, cm.message AS last_message, cm.message_date AS last_message_date FROM chat_room cr JOIN chat_pp cp ON cr.chat_room_idx = cp.chat_room_idx LEFT JOIN chat_msg cm ON cr.chat_room_idx = cm.chat_room_idx WHERE cm.chatMsg_idx = ( SELECT MAX(chatMsg_idx) FROM chat_msg WHERE chat_room_idx = cr.chat_room_idx ) AND EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM chat_pp WHERE chat_room_idx = cr.chat_room_idx AND emp_id = #{param1} ) GROUP BY cr.chat_room_idx ORDER BY last_message_date DESC;
SELECT cp.emp_id, emp.emp_name from chat_pp cp join employee emp on cp.emp_id = emp.emp_id where chat_room_idx = #{param1}
